title: Madre Tierra
description: One of the larger health food stores in Arroyo with air-conditioning. Stocks a selection of Fry's chilled vegan foods, such as veggie sausages, nuggets, and burgers. Also has biscuits, herbal remedies, supplements, wheat-free and celiac-friendly foods from the Schar's range, shampoo, and toiletries. In this international nutrition and diet centre, English, Spanish and French are all spoken. Maria Teresa, the owner, is a level 3 affiliated practitioner of Clark Therapy and Biomagnetic Pair which helps eliminate toxins and pain from the body. Other therapies available include ozone therapy, Bach Flower and Orthomolecular medicine.
streetAddress: Avenida Inmaculada Concepcion, 8, Arroyo de la Miel, Malaga
